title: Zombie Pinball Arcade HD PRO v1.1 [PD]
description:
Zombie Pinball Arcade HD PRO is a Pinball Game like you've never seen, coming to an Android Phone near you!

Realistic pinball action, fun gameplay, cool graphics will have you playing this addictive classic pinballgames for hours.

***PINBALL PRO GAME***
This year treat yourself to a real TRICK or TREAT...
Zombie Pinball Arcade HD PRO is a great way to kill time
AND
Kill Zombies Dead at the same time.

***FEATURES***
- Hidden Pinball Levels
- Game bonuses
- Stunning HD graphics
- Over 3000 Android Devices Supported...
- Hours of Fun!

***BONUSES***
Aim for these game achievements to SCORE bonus points!
- Spell the word "zombie"
- Unleash the Walking Dead by hitting the tombstone
- Splat Zombie Eyes
- Spill the Barrel of Radioactive Waste
- Trigger A Nuclear Explosion
- Wake Up The Zombie Hunter

***HOW TO PLAY***
- Press the Left or Right Toggles to Hit the Ball
- Press on the "Launch Ball" Button to Start Playing!

***SUPPORTED ANDROID DEVICES***
Over 3,000 Android Phones Supported, including:
HTC: ISW13HT; myTouch 4G Slide; HTC EVO 4G LTE; HTC 606w; HTC One VX
MOTOROLA: XOOM; Droid Ultra; Droid; Droid Mini; Backflip; Motorola MOT-XT681
SAMSUNG: Galaxy R-Style; Galaxy Note 10.1; Galaxy S Advance; Galaxy Ace; Galaxy Tab;Galaxy Note 8; Galaxy S III; Galaxy S4 Active

Zombie Pinball Arcade HD PRO is waiting for extreme Pinball champs and heroes like yourselves to come save the day and defeat the marauding zombies. This is a great app to add to your android game collection, emulating the nostalgic pinball machines that were so much fun to play in the 1980's.

If you love games such as zombiegunship, ihatezombies and zombiewood this freepinball game is for you!

More info:
